validation.after: The {attr} must be a date after :date
validation.after_or_equal: The {attr} must be a date after or equal to :date
validation.alpha_dash: The {attr} may only contain letters, numbers, dashes and underscores
validation.alpha_num: The {attr} may only contain letters and numbers
validation.before: The {attr} must be a date before :date
validation.before_or_equal: The {attr} must be a date before or equal to :date

between.file: The {attr} must be between :min and :max kilobytes
between.string: The {attr} must be between :min and :max characters
between.array: The {attr} must have between :min and :max items

validation.boolean: The {attr} field must be true or false

validation.date_equals: The {attr} must be a date equal to :date

validation.digits_between: The {attr} must be between :min and :max digits
validation.distinct: The {attr} field has a duplicate value
validation.email: The {attr} must be a valid email address
validation.ends_with: The {attr} must end with one of the following: {values}
validation.filled: The {attr} field must have a value
validation.in_array: The {attr} field does not exist in {attr2}
validation.ip: The {attr} must be a valid IP address
validation.ipv4: The {attr} must be a valid IPv4 address
validation.ipv6: The {attr} must be a valid IPv6 address
validation.json: The {attr} must be a valid JSON string

max.string: The {attr} may not be greater than {max} characters
max.array: The {attr} may not have more than {max} items

validation.mimes: The {attr} must be a file of type: {values}

min.file: The {attr} must be at least {min} kilobytes
min.string: The {attr} must be at least {min} characters

min.branches: The number of existing branches has already exceeded this number
min.points_of_sale: There are branches with more points of sale

orderReceived.title: Your order has been received
orderReceived.content: You will get a call from us to confirm your order in the very soon..

preparingOrder.title: Order is being prepared

deliveringOrder.title: Order is in its way
deliveringOrder.content: Your order has been prepared and is being delivered to you in minutes.

OrderDelivered.title: Order delivered
OrderDelivered.content: Your order has been delivered. Hope you enjoy it !

orderConfirmed.title: Order confirmed successfully
orderConfirmed.content: Your order has been confirmed to be delivered successfully. We are always honoured to serve you.

orderCancelled.title: Order cancelled !
orderCancelled.content: Your order has been cancelled upon your request. Hope to see you again.

AppsBackedUp.title: Backup done for all clients !
AppsBackedUp.content: We have just backed up all your clients' databases. This action is scheduled to be done every 4 hours starting from 12:00 AM/PM everyday.

DatabaseBackup.title: Master database has been backed up !
DatabaseBackup.content: We have just finished taking a backup of the master database containing the data of all clients. This procedure is scheduled to take place twice at 12:00 morning and evening of each day.

areYouSureYouWantToX: are you sure that you want to {x}
taxableMsg: It is usually closed with suppliers outside the country so that taxes are not collected in sales and purchases.
taxableAdvice: For suppliers within Saudi Arabia, taxes must be collected. Make sure to check the "taxable" button above.
majorDescription: change in the program that either breaks old functionality or is so big that it somehow changes how users should use the program
minorDescription: some change that adds new functionality but doesn't change the program in any major way
patchDescription: a new version of the software with the remedy of one or several defects
demoApp:
Demo version

Contains forms filled with data automatically and uses files of relatively large sizes
liveApp:
Software is uploaded to cPanel domain/sub-domain

Uses files of relatively small sizes
offlineApp:
Offline version

Not associated with a domain name and will not work without a license
subscribedApps:
subscribed apps

press "unsubscribe" to stop using any app
unsubscribedApps:
unsubscribed apps

press "subscribe now" to start using any app
clickToUpdateBusinessTypeScreenshot: click the live preview button to update business type image
newVersionAvailableNow: a newer version is available now
receivedReportedProblem: Your message has been received, and one of our support representatives will get back to you as soon as possible
noConnection: This feature is not available when offline. Make sure you have a good internet connection
installAppsImmediately: start organization's apps installation immediately after creating it
updateAppsImmediately: update all apps once a newer version is available
homepage.org.name: AFAQ RGB for information tech.
homepage.org.slogan: For the design and development of accounting programs, websites and e-marketing services
homepage.org.description:
Afaq RGB was established in 2013 as a leading institution in the field of software design and implementation and e-marketing services

Afaq RGB is one of the most important companies in the industry of software solutions and marketing systems services, and its goal is to help companies and institutions obtain the best programming and marketing services at an appropriate cost so that their decision makers can develop their business with the ability to better market their products and services electronically, which helps them to reach customers In the end, the company will be able to obtain a good share of the local market in light of fierce and fierce competition from abroad and inside
